services.title: EVENT MANAGEMENT
services.subtitle: WE PLAN. WE DESIGN. WE EXECUTE.
services.description: Echohive creatives offers comprehensive event management services for individuals, corporates, brands, and organisations, delivering precision and innovation.

details.heroSubtitle: Comprehensive event/production services for individuals, corporates, and brands.
whyContent: We specialise in transforming visions into unforgettable experiences through meticulous planning and creative execution.
From intimate weddings to large-scale corporate launches, we handle every detail with precision.

capabilities.title: Event Photography & Videography

capabilities.title: Live Streaming & Multimedia Coverage
capabilities.description: Broadcasting your event to a global audience in real-time.

services.title: DRONE SERVICES
services.subtitle: AERIAL SHOOTS & RENTALS.
services.description: Premium drone services handled by certified pilots, covering aerial photography, videography, surveying, and cost-effective rentals.

details.heroSubtitle: Premium drone services by certified pilots + Rentals.
whyContent: Aerial perspectives add a unique and professional dimension to any project.
We offer both full-service piloting and rental options to suit your specific needs.

services.title: GEAR RENTALS
services.subtitle: PROFESSIONAL CREATIVE EQUIPMENT.
services.description: Affordable rental of professional creative equipment including cameras, lenses, lighting, and audio gear for your production needs.

details.heroSubtitle: Affordable rental of professional equipment for events and shoots.
whyContent: Access industry-standard equipment without the high upfront cost.
We maintain our gear meticulously to ensure reliability on your shoot.
